useAllNewFunctions.description: whether all set of new functions is to be used (include processes and factors)

useNewFunction4TF.description: whether the new Temp Factor function is to be used

useNewFunction4WF.description: whether the new Water Function function is to be used

useSingleFactors4Miner.description: whether mineralisation factors for SOM and FOM are calculated together or separate

useMultiFactors4MinerSOM.description: whether mineralisation factors are calculated for each SOM pool

useMultiFactors4MinerFOM.description: whether mineralisation factors are calculated for each FOM pool

n2o_approach.description: Alternative nit/dnit approaches for n2o calculation (0def 1wnmm 2nemis 3cent)

wnmm_n_alpha.description: WNMM: maximum fraction of nitrification rate as N2O

wnmm_dn_alpha.description: WNMM: maximum fraction of denitrification rate at wfps = 0.8

nemis_dn_km.description: NEMIS: half-saturation consntant for NO3 reduction (unit ppm = mgN/kg)

nemis_dn_pot.description: potential denitrification rate at 20C, undisturbed, saturated soil [NO3-] = 200 mgN/kg

cent_n_maxt_ave.description: long term average maximum monthly temperature of the hottest month

cent_n_wfps_ave.description: average wfps in top nitrifyDepth of soil

cent_n_max_rate.description: maximum fraction of ammonium to NO3 during nitrification (gN/m2)

SoilParamSet.description: the parameter set used to initialise SoilNitrogen

allow_simpleSoilTemp.description: whether internal soilTemp can be used, otherwise the SoilTemp has to be present

profile_reduction.description: whether soil profle rediction is on or off

use_organic_solutes.description: whether organic solute are on or off

WarningThreshold.description: threshold for raising a warning for negative concentrations

FatalThreshold.description: threshold for a fatal error for negative concentrations (ppm)

OC2OM_factor.description: factor to convert organic carbon to organic matter

minPatchArea.description: minimum allowable relative area for a patch (0-1)

ef_res.description: fraction of residue C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

fr_res_biom.description: fraction of retained residue C transferred to biomass (0-1)

min_depth.description: depth of soil from which N can be immobilised by decomposing surface residues (mm)

rd_carb.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool1 (0-1)

rd_cell.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool2 (0-1)

rd_lign.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool3 (0-1)

ef_fom.description: fraction of FOM C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

fr_fom_biom.description: fraction of retained FOM C transferred to biomass (0-1)

cnrf_coeff.description: coeff. to determine the magnitude of C:N effects on decomposition of FOM

cnrf_optcn.description: C:N above which decomposition rate of FOM declines

stfMinerFOM_Topt.description: parameter for temp factor, optimum temperature (aerobic and anaerobic)

stfMinerFOM_FctrZero.description: parameter for temp factor, value of factor at zero degrees (aerobic and anaerobic)

stfMinerFOM_CvExp.description: parameter for temp factor, curve exponent (aerobic and anaerobic)

swfMinerFOM_x.description: parameter for moist factor, values of modified swc (0-3)

swfMinerFOM_y.description: parameter for moist factor, swf values corresponding to x

cnfMinerFOM_OptCN.description: parameter for C:N ratio factor, variation rate

cnfMinerFOM_RateCN.description: parameter for C:N ratio factor, optimum CN value

rc_stf_minerFomCH_Topt.description: parameter for FOM's carbohydrate mineralisation temp factor, stf at zero

rc_stf_minerFomCH_FctrZero.description: parameter for FOM's carbohydrate mineralisation temp factor, optimum temp

rc_stf_minerFomCH_CvExp.description: parameter for FOM's carbohydrate mineralisation temp factor, exponent

rc_stf_minerFomCl_Topt.description: parameter for FOM's celulose mineralisation temp factor, stf at zero

rc_stf_minerFomCl_FctrZero.description: parameter for FOM's celulose mineralisation temp factor, optimum temp

rc_stf_minerFomCl_CvExp.description: parameter for FOM's celulose mineralisation temp factor, exponent

rc_stf_minerFomLg_Topt.description: parameter for FOM's lignine mineralisation temp factor, stf at zero

rc_stf_minerFomLg_FctrZero.description: parameter for FOM's lignine mineralisation temp factor, optimum temp

rc_stf_minerFomLg_CvExp.description: parameter for FOM's lignine mineralisation temp factor, exponent

rd_biom.description: potential daily rate of soil biomass mineralization (aerobic and anaerobic conditions)

ef_biom.description: fraction of biomass C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

fr_biom_biom.description: fraction of retained biomass C returned to biomass (0-1)

rd_hum.description: potential daily rate of humus mineralization (aerobic and anaerobic conditions)

ef_hum.description: fraction of humic C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

opt_temp.description: Soil temperature above which there is no further effect on mineralisation and nitrification (aerobic and anaerobic)

wfmin_index.description: index specifying water content for water factor for mineralization

wfmin_values.description: value of water factor function at given index values(mineralization)
